The above dialogue is not very good, but it illustrates how we can use the <s> and </s> tags to indicate that one sentence has been replaced by another. The <s> tag indicates that the text inside should be ignored; the </s> tag indicates that the text inside should be restored.

## 2.3.4. The Dialog Manager¶

Dialog managers are responsible for managing dialogs and their state, as well as handling user input. They also provide a way of communicating with other components
